entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
